captions.text:
VOICE
From the blockbuster franchise that

nobody loves, but everybody likes
enough that they won't change the

channel when it's on cable, comes
the sequel that kinda sounds like a
high-speed handjob...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Fast Five.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Wait, they've made five of these
already?

VOICE (CONT'D)
Prepare for the biggest hit of this

street racing franchise...because
it got rid of all the street-
racing.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Now it's a heist film on wheels,

orchestrated by Vin Diesel...a
passable action hero...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Who this time must match wits with

a far more charismatic action hero:
The Rock...Who's jacked up on baby
oil

VOICE (CONT'D)
Together they'll crank up the NOS

on all the things you've come to
expect from a Fast & Furious movie,
like...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Gear-shifting

VOICE (CONT'D)
Mumble-growls..
You got my word Vince

Wughgh kinda counting on it
I remember everything about my
faaather

VOICE (CONT'D)
And overt homoeroticism.

VOICE (CONT'D)
To pull off one last job...Dom will
need to gather everyone's favorite
heist movie stereotypes:

VOICE (CONT'D)
The hunky mastermind

VOICE (CONT'D)
The nerd

VOICE (CONT'D)
The Bernie Mac

VOICE (CONT'D)
The guy who can't speak English

VOICE (CONT'D)
And the guy who's constantly
snacking.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Gear up to steal $100 million

dollars with the dumbest criminals
ever, as they...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Take off their masks during
robberies.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Go for leisurely strolls while all
of Rio's drug gangs are after them.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And drag-race cop cars they just

stole down the middle of the
street.

VOICE (CONT'D)
These heroes will stop at nothing

to take down a sort-of ruthless
drug lord, by...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Destroying poor neighborhoods...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Destroying rich neighborhoods...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Killing 22 cops with a giant metal
safe...

VOICE (CONT'D)
And ultimately leaving Rio in way
worse shape than they found it.

VOICE (CONT'D)
So refuel and ride along while

these rebels break every law in the
book...of physics...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Gravity!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Weight differential!

VOICE (CONT'D)
And friction!
VOICE (CONT'D)
Buckle up for the fifth film in the
franchise, that's technically the
fourth, since the events of Fast
Three take place after Fast Six,
making the third fast the sixth
fast, possibly the seventh
depending on where Fast 7 ends up in the timeline--Hey look! Car boobs!

VOICE (CONT'D)
UGH...we get it! You can nitpick movies!
But can you do this?
BOOBS!

CINEMA SINS VOICE 
Ah, fair enough.

CINEMA SINS VOICE 
Ah, fair enough.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Thanks to the people at Cinema Sins.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Be sure to subscribe.
for more Honest Trailers
"All your base are belong to us"
"Hoof hearted"
"Banana Hammock"
"Lasso Lassie's Legendary Legless Lego-Legolas"
"Viewer discretion advised"
"My cat's breath smells like cat food"

comments.author: Anakin Sky Walker

comments.text:
Yeah, or we could just stand at the edge of the cliff and then realize that 
the people making these movies (writers, producers, directors) no longer 
respect or care about the original fan base, and are also not interested in 
making a quality film of any kind. All they care about is gimmicks, cheesy 
action sequences, increasingly over the top, unnecessary, and unrealistic 
stunts, one-dimensional characters, extremely overused movie tropes, 
stereotypes, and plots, and make no attempt at digging beneath the surface, 
all they care about is what they think is flashy (but actually is not)

So yeah after realizing that I'd probably step away from the edge of the 
cliff and let you jump
comments.author: Bricksquadswag92

comments.text:

comments.author: Benjamin Abramowitz

comments.text:
1-People love Fast Five. Fast 6 and 7 got mixed fan reaction. Sequel 
escalation demands that each movie be crazier and more over the top then 
the last. Which is why the franchise gets more and more ridiculous and 
loses creditablity. It is slowly getting sillier and losing its charm and 
humor. It's not as bad as Transformers but at the rate things are going it 
could get there.
2-Fast and Furious has been around since 2001 and had a small fan base 
until only recently when Fast Five in 2011 catapulted it into a Summer 
blockbuster.
3-You don't have to like F&F but it deserves a better comparison than 
Transformers. Everybody compares every romance movie they don't like to 
Twilight and everybody compares every action movie they don't like to 
Transformers. There is no comparison. Comparing F&F at its very worst to 
Transformers is like comparing Pearl Harbor to the Holocaust. Even the 
Expendables is better than Transformers. The biggest difference between F&F 
and Transformers is effort and creativity. F&F has well choreographed fight 
scenes, elaborate, clever, and well thought up action scenes. F&F only 
problem is it ignores the laws of physics and its characters can survive 
any catastrophic accident. Transformers is a bunch of robots incoherently 
shooting and hitting each other in slow motion. The action and dialogue is 
cliche. There is not an ounce of original thought or creativity put into 
Transformers. The jokes are disgusting, offensive, juvenile, and...weird. 
Transformers is painful to watch. Particularly the 2nd one (never watched 
the 4th one). It didn't even look like Michael Bay was trying to earn his 
check. Even the most outlandish F&F scene required some crazy, outside the 
box directing. Any 9yr old boy could do Michael Bay's job.

comments.text:
Nice use of sarcasm! Everyone knows that no one is actually excited for 
Fast 7 lol.. I bet the two ppl that responded to this comment before me 
were profiles created by the ppl in charge of marketing the movie (Yes I 
refuse to classify it as a film) 

Also can we get that foreign guy thats on Family Guy, the one that is just 
understanding sarcasm, to respond to this user's comment?

Btw I'm not a hater of the entire franchise, I love the original Fast and 
the Furious, and also Tokyo Drift.. I just hate that they've ruined what 
could have been a good franchise.. I mean seriously, the second and fourth 
movies aren't good, but they're at least tolerable, and than after that, 
it's just a slap in the face to everything the franchise was, a complete an 
utter disgrace to the industry, I can't believe ppl buy in to this crap
